meanings.definition: To swallow hastily or in large amounts.
meanings.sent1: She gulped down her water after a long run.
meanings.sent2: The hungry dog gulped his food in seconds.
meanings.sent3: He gulped his drink so fast, he almost got brain freeze!
meanings.sent4: The news was so shocking, it felt like I gulped a bitter truth.
meanings.sent5: The child gulped the medicine, making a face at the taste.

meanings.sent1: She took a big gulp of water after playing outside.
meanings.sent2: The man finished his drink in one big gulp.
meanings.sent3: The gulp of juice was so refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: His gulp of soda seemed to last forever in the scorching heat.
meanings.sent5: The gulp of milk was so cold, it gave him brain freeze.
